plugin.name: core
plugin.description: The SKSE plugin dlls, the default layout assets, and the MCM options are all included. This is all you need to get going.

plugin.name: Soulsy icon set
plugin.description: These are icons chosen specifically for Soulsy. They look different from the usual SkyUI icons, but might be a nice change of pace.

plugin.name: THICC icon set
plugin.description: This icon set is used with permission from the THICC icon collection. It will look similar to your game menu icons.

group.name: Pick a layout to start with.

plugin.name: Default layout
plugin.description:
Use the default layout, a diamond in the lower left of the screen. Uses Futura and harmonizes with the Tarnished UI theme.
All the layouts will be installed for you in the folder `SKSE/plugins/soulsy_layouts`. Copy any of them into place as `SoulsyHUD_Layout.toml` to use that one in-game.

plugin.name: Top left
plugin.description:

All the layouts will be installed for you in the folder `SKSE/plugins/soulsy_layouts`. Copy any of them into place as `SoulsyHUD_Layout.toml` to use that one in-game.

plugin.name: Extended character sets
plugin.description:
Just like the default layout, but this specifies a font that supports extended character sets, such as Cyrillic and Chinese. You can edit any layout to use the Inter typeface and to enable the character sets you need.
All the layouts will be installed for you in the folder `SKSE/plugins/soulsy_layouts`. Copy any of them into place as `SoulsyHUD_Layout.toml` to use that one in-game.
